org.apache.oodt.cas.catalog.struct

Interface QueryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSourceIndex, InMemoryIndex, WorkflowManagerDataSourceIndex

    public interface QueryService
    Version:
    $Revision$

    A Interface for performing queries to a Catalog

    Author:
    bfoster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<TransactionId<?>,List<TermBucket>> getBuckets(List<TransactionId<?>> transactionIds)
      Does the same as getBuckets(TransactionId), except is performed over a list of TransactionIds
      List<TermBucket> getBuckets(TransactionId<?> transactionId)
      Returns a List of TermBuckets ingested for a given TransactionId
      List<IngestReceipt> query(QueryExpression queryExpression)
      Returns all the TransactionIds that fall under the given query
      List<IngestReceipt> query(QueryExpression queryExpression, int startIndex, int endIndex)
      Returns the results of the given query such that: [startIndex, endIndex)
      int sizeOf(QueryExpression queryExpression)
      Returns the number of results found for the given query

    • Method Detail

      • query

        List<IngestReceipt> query(QueryExpression queryExpression)
                   throws QueryServiceException
        Returns all the TransactionIds that fall under the given query
        Returns:
        Returns a List of TransactionIds that meet the query, otherwise an empty List is no TransactionIds are found for the given query
        Throws:
        QueryServiceException

      • query

        List<IngestReceipt> query(QueryExpression queryExpression,
                          int startIndex,
                          int endIndex)
                   throws QueryServiceException
        Returns the results of the given query such that: [startIndex, endIndex)
        Parameters:
        queryExpression - The query for which results will be returned
        startIndex - The start index of subset of results to be returned
        endIndex - The end index of the subset of results to be returned
        Returns:
        The results of the given query such that: [startIndex, endIndex)
        Throws:
        QueryServiceException - on an error

      • sizeOf

        int sizeOf(QueryExpression queryExpression)
    throws QueryServiceException
        Returns the number of results found for the given query
        Parameters:
        queryExpression - The query whose size in question
        Returns:
        The number of results found for the given query
        Throws:
        QueryServiceException - on an error

      • getBuckets

        List<TermBucket> getBuckets(TransactionId<?> transactionId)
                     throws QueryServiceException
        Returns a List of TermBuckets ingested for a given TransactionId
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The TransactionId in question
        Returns:
        A List of TermBuckets for the given TransactionId or empty list if no record of the give TranactionId exists
        Throws:
        QueryServiceException

      • getBuckets

        Map<TransactionId<?>,List<TermBucket>> getBuckets(List<TransactionId<?>> transactionIds)
                                           throws QueryServiceException
        Does the same as getBuckets(TransactionId), except is performed over a list of TransactionIds
        Parameters:
        transactionIds - A List of TransactionIds for which TermBuckets are wanted
        Returns:
        A Map of TransactionIds to TermBuckets
        Throws:
        QueryServiceException
